pages.text:
OUR STORY
Pepper's is a
family-owned
local business serving only the
finest quality
Mexican food made fresh every day with an extensive Tequila collection, and full bar.
We have three locations throughout the Jacksonville area with outdoor patios, providing the perfect place for families or a date night.
Our family is dedicated to providing an authentic mexican experience from food to atmosphere.
BLOG
Where we share our latest creations, inspiration for our recipes, family history and more!
Featured
Main Image
Products: Quick View
Timestamp
Aug 21, 2025
The Ultimate Tequila Lover’s Guide and Cantina Favorites at Pepper's Cocina
Timestamp
Aug 21, 2025
Whether you’re in the mood for a margarita with friends, exploring tequila flights, or pairing your drink with tacos at the best tequila bar near me, Pepper’s Cocina is your go-to destination.
Timestamp
Aug 21, 2025
Main Image
Products: Quick View
Timestamp
Jul 18, 2025
Authentic Mexican Restaurants in Jacksonville: Why Pepper’s Cocina Is a Local Favorite
Timestamp
Jul 18, 2025
If you're searching for Mexican restaurants in Jacksonville that bring bold flavors, authentic recipes, and a vibrant dining atmosphere, look no further than Pepper’s Cocina Mexicana.
Timestamp
Jul 18, 2025
Main Image
Products: Quick View
Timestamp
Jun 16, 2025
Summer Specials Have Arrived at Pepper’s Cocina Mexicana
Timestamp
Jun 16, 2025
Get a taste of summer at Pepper’s Cocina with limited-time drinks, appetizers, & entrées. Explore why we're one of the top Mexican restaurants in Jacksonville!
Timestamp
Jun 16, 2025
SEE MORE BLOG POSTS
